basecost [gcost]: 10035
land shape [landshape]: â‡” #1411 Ichtycentaur Cataphract

(lance-ok [lanceok], amphibious [amphibian], recuperation [heal])

item slots [slots]: 2 hands, head, body, 2 misc
Life underneath the waves corresponds in many ways to that on dry land. Halfmen, like humans, have underwater counterparts. Ichtycentaurs appear as centaurs with fish tails instead of hind legs. They are wild beings that roam the kelp forests of shallow waters, not unlike the centaurs that roam the woodlands on dry land. Ichtycentaurs have strange abilities of transformation and can remove their tails to walk on dry land. The ichtycentaur cataphract has heavy armor on the front part of his body and this coupled with his great speed makes him very difficult to harm in combat.
